org.commonreality.sensors.base
Class BaseSensor

java.lang.Object
  org.commonreality.participant.impl.AbstractParticipant
      org.commonreality.sensors.AbstractSensor
          org.commonreality.sensors.base.BaseSensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.commonreality.identifier.IIdentifiable, org.commonreality.participant.IParticipant, org.commonreality.sensors.ISensor
public abstract class BaseSensor
extends org.commonreality.sensors.AbstractSensor

skeletal sensor that utilizes a PerceptManager to create and process percepts based on some other listening mechanism. It is up to the implementor to provide a subclass of PerceptManager to this sensor and some mechanism to call PerceptManager.markAsDirty(Object) for the relevant objects that need to be perceived.
Extenders must implement processPercepts() which should in turn call PerceptManager.processDirtyObjects()

Author:
developer
